name: Trade Blinds
tag_list: blinds, shades, roller-blinds, roman-blinds, vertical-blinds, venetian-blinds, wooden-blinds, blackout-blinds, made-to-measure-blinds, window-blinds, luxury-blinds
overview:
Trade Blinds are manufacturers and suppliers of luxury made to measure blinds to both the public and trade alike. In business for over twenty five years and online for over ten years via their ecommerce website, they pride themselves in offering high quality window blinds at affordable prices.

Specialising in commercial shading solutions, energy efficient blinds and a wide range of domestic window blinds, Trade Blinds offer a stunning collection of bespoke roller blinds, roman blinds, vertical blinds, venetian blinds and wooden blinds. All handmade in-house to the highest standards ensuring each and very blind will become a beautifully luxurious addition to any home or office.

From traditional to contemporary, Trade Blinds gorgeous range of soft fabrics, woods, blackout, thermally efficient and waterproof fabrics means there is a blind or shade to suit any style of interior dÃ©cor and bring practicality, functionality and luxury to the windows in the most fabulous way.
